alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 20 at 10:51AM EST until February 20 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR POTENTIAL ICE JAM FLOODING REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by potential ice jams will continue to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Michigan, including the Grand River in Ottawa county. * WHEN...Through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Localized flooding of low lying areas and property along the Grand River will be possible. Rapid water level fluctuations may occur due to heavy ice cover on the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - The potential for ice jam flooding will remain possible into Monday along the stretch of the Grand River through Ottawa County...especially as the ice may move downstream. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for additional Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
